tools.name: check_availability
tools.description: Check available appointment slots for a specific date
tools.version_description: Fetches available appointment times for the specified date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
tools.fallback_content: The appointment system is currently unavailable. Please try again later or contact us directly.

tools.name: book_appointment
tools.description: Book a mental health appointment with patient information
tools.version_description: Creates a new appointment booking with patient details and sends confirmation.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "required": ["patient_name", "phone", "date", "time"], "properties": { "patient_name": { "type": "string", "description": "Patient's full name" }, "phone": { "type": "string", "description": "Patient's phone number" }, "date": { "type": "string", "description": "Appointment date (YYYY-MM-DD format)" }, "time": { "type": "string", "description": "Appointment time (HH:MM format)" }, "presenting_issue": { "type": "string", "description": "Main reason for seeking mental health support" }, "gp_referral": { "type": "string", "description": "GP referral details if applicable" }, "therapy_goals": { "type": "string", "description": "What the patient hopes to achieve from therapy" } } }
tools.fallback_content: The booking system is currently unavailable. Please try again later or contact us directly to book your appointment.

tools.name: save_patient_info
tools.description: Securely save patient information for screening and records
tools.version_description: Stores patient information securely for future reference and screening purposes.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "required": ["patient_name", "phone"], "properties": { "patient_name": { "type": "string", "description": "Patient's full name" }, "phone": { "type": "string", "description": "Patient's phone number" }, "presenting_issue": { "type": "string", "description": "Main concern or reason for seeking help" }, "screening_status": { "type": "string", "enum": ["incomplete", "complete", "high_risk"], "description": "Current status of the screening process" } } }
tools.fallback_content: Unable to save patient information at the moment. Please try again or contact us directly.

tools.name: log_risk_assessment
tools.description: Log risk assessment results and trigger alerts for high-risk cases
tools.version_description: Records risk assessment data and triggers appropriate alerts for high-risk situations.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "required": ["patient_name", "risk_level"], "properties": { "patient_name": { "type": "string", "description": "Patient's name" }, "risk_level": { "type": "string", "enum": ["low", "medium", "high", "crisis"], "description": "Assessed risk level based on screening" }, "suicide_risk": { "type": "boolean", "description": "Whether suicide risk was identified" }, "self_harm_risk": { "type": "boolean", "description": "Whether self-harm risk was identified" }, "crisis_intervention_provided": { "type": "boolean", "description": "Whether crisis intervention resources were provided" }, "notes": { "type": "string", "description": "Additional notes about the risk assessment" } } }
tools.fallback_content: Unable to log risk assessment at the moment. If you're in crisis, please call Lifeline on 13 11 14 immediately.

tools.name: get_practice_info
tools.description: Get information about the mental health practice
tools.version_description: Provides practice information including hours, pricing, location, and services offered.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "required": [], "properties": { "info_type": { "type": "string", "enum": ["hours", "pricing", "location", "services", "all"], "description": "Type of information requested about the practice" } } }
tools.fallback_content: Unable to retrieve practice information at the moment. Please contact us directly for assistance.

tools.name: log_consent
tools.description: Log patient consent for call recording
tools.version_description: Records whether the patient has given consent for the call to be recorded for quality purposes.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "required": ["consent_given"], "properties": { "consent_given": { "type": "boolean", "description": "Whether the patient has given consent for call recording" }, "reason": { "type": "string", "description": "Optional reason for consent decision" } } }
tools.fallback_content: Unable to log consent at the moment. Please proceed with the call.

tools.name: log_privacy_check
tools.version_description: Records whether the patient has confirmed they are in a private location for the call.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "required": ["privacy_confirmed"], "properties": { "privacy_confirmed": { "type": "boolean", "description": "Whether the patient has confirmed they are in a private location" }, "reason": { "type": "string", "description": "Optional reason for privacy status" } } }
tools.fallback_content: Unable to log privacy check at the moment. Please proceed with the call.

tools.name: send_confirmation
tools.description: Send appointment confirmation via SMS or email
tools.version_description: Sends appointment confirmation messages to patients via their preferred method.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "required": ["patient_name", "phone", "date", "time"], "properties": { "patient_name": { "type": "string", "description": "Patient's name" }, "phone": { "type": "string", "description": "Patient's phone number for SMS confirmation" }, "date": { "type": "string", "description": "Appointment date (YYYY-MM-DD format)" }, "time": { "type": "string", "description": "Appointment time (HH:MM format)" }, "confirmation_type": { "type": "string", "enum": ["sms", "email", "both"], "description": "How to send the confirmation" } } }
tools.fallback_content: Unable to send confirmation at the moment, but your appointment is still booked. Please contact us if you need to confirm your appointment details.
